title: Great Home 3 Blocks from Ferry & PSNS Shipyard
posting_body: ['Brand new renovation.', ' Walk to the Seattle high speed ferry (5 min walk).', '  PSNS  shipyard is a 3 min walk.', ' Olympic College is close.', ' Corner top floor.', ' Lots of natural light.', "Renovated Historic WWII Admiral's House.", ' This home was built during World War II for a US Navy Admiral.', " We've renovated it into apartments.", 'Perfect for working at the shipyard Seattle commuter, or for a college student.', 'We screen for credit & background.', "Income must be 3x one month's rent.", "We're good people and hope you are too.", " We're a small family owned group of property owners based in Seattle and Bremerton.", ' We take really good care of our properties and want you to as well.', 'PARKING SPACE $50 per month.', 'Water/sewer garbage $40/ month.', 'Large fenced yard with trees.', ' Coin laundry.', 'This clean apartment has refrigerator, electric range with oven, microwave, window blinds and drapes, baseboard heat.', 'The large windows give view and light.', 'The floor plan uses the space well throughout the bedroom, bath, living room, kitchen, and entry hall.', 'Bedroom has a large closet.', 'We are not registered as Section 8 housing.', 'Screening Considerations and criteria: Rental History', 'Length of valid rental history (written contract vs. verbal agreement)', 'Late payments', 'NSF checks', 'Noise Complaints', 'Property damage', 'Unfulfilled lease obligations', 'Balance owing landlord (unpaid rent, damages, etc.)', 'Evictions (unpaid vs. paid)', 'Employment History', 'Length of employment (continuous or within the same field)', 'Employment verification', 'Income Requirement', 'Considerations:', 'Income threshold (e.g. 3 times the rental amount to qualify for approval)', 'Treatment of non garnishable income (state law may apply)', '#1.']
